row.title: Award winning team

items.description:
Celtic Elements is a Welsh, Vegan, Wellness brand. We use Welsh natural ingredients from the hillsides & coast of Wales in our Skincare, Body care and Well being ranges.

We believe in using locally sourced products whist reducing our waste as much as possible and help our customers to do the same.
items.title: Celtic elements
